SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SCP.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :SET &UC4RB_SCP_RECURSIVE_GET# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_SCP_RECURSIVE_GET#) :SET &UC4RB_SCP_TGT_OVERWRITE# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_SCP_TGT_OVERWRITE#) :SET &UC4RB_SCP_PRESERVE_ATT# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_SCP_PRESERVE_ATT#)
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS"
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SCP_SRC_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SCP_SRC_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SCP_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SCP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#scp-tool.jar" dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "SCP" ? -h "&UC4RB_SCP_HOST#" ? -p "&UC4RB_SCP_PORT#" ? -u "&UC4RB_SCP_USER#" ? -pwd "&UC4RB_SCP_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_SCP_SRC_FILES_DIR#" ? -r "&UC4RB_SCP_RECURSIVE_GET#" ? -to "&UC4RB_SCP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT#" ? -tgt "&UC4RB_SCP_TGT_FILES_DIR#" ? -o "&UC4RB_SCP_TGT_OVERWRITE#" ? -prv "&UC4RB_SCP_PRESERVE_ATT#"
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX"
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SCP_SRC_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SCP_SRC_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SCP_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SCP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#scp-tool.jar" dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "SCP" ? -h "&UC4RB_SCP_HOST#" ? -p "&UC4RB_SCP_PORT#" ? -u "&UC4RB_SCP_USER#" ? -pwd "&UC4RB_SCP_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_SCP_SRC_FILES_DIR#" ? -r "&UC4RB_SCP_RECURSIVE_GET#" ? -to "&UC4RB_SCP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT#" ? -tgt "&UC4RB_SCP_TGT_FILES_DIR#" ? -o "&UC4RB_SCP_TGT_OVERWRITE#" ? -prv "&UC4RB_SCP_PRESERVE_ATT#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:OTHER : STOP NOMSG, 50, "Unknown Platform" :ENDSWITCH

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(, , "RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS", , "REP", , "COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*=>*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &FROM# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 1) : SET &COPYING_ROW# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&FROM#, "Copying") : IF &COPYING_ROW# = "Y" : SET &ARTIFACT_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 2) : SET &ARTIFACT_NAME# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&ARTIFACT_NAME#, &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_DIR#, "") : SET &ARTIFACT_NAME# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&ARTIFACT_NAME#, "'", "") : SET &ARTIFACT_NAME# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&ARTIFACT_NAME#, "\", "/") : SET &ARTIFACT_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&ARTIFACT_NAME#) : SET &CHECK# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&ARTIFACT_NAME#, "/") : IF &CHECK# = "Y" : SET &ARTIFACT_NAME# = SUBSTR(&ARTIFACT_NAME#, 2) : ENDIF : SET &FROM# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&FROM#, "Copying", "") : SET &FROM# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&FROM#, "'", "") : SET &FROM# = STR_TRIM(&FROM#) : IF &ARTIFACT_NAME# <> "" : SET &IS_CHECKSUM_FILE# = STR_ENDS_WITH(&ARTIFACT_NAME#, "md5") : IF &IS_CHECKSUM_FILE# = "N" : SET &IS_CHECKSUM_FILE# = STR_ENDS_WITH(&ARTIFACT_NAME#, "sha1") : IF &IS_CHECKSUM_FILE# = "N" : PUT_VAR &UC4RB_SCP_VARA_NAME#, &ARTIFACT_NAME#, "", &FROM# : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
